      • getStringData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getStringData​(java.lang.String state,
                                                           int index,
                                                           java.lang.String filename)
        returns data on number of cases of covid, death of covid cased on state name
        Parameters:
        state - name of the state of desire
        index - counted from 0 from right on cases.csv file
        filename - name of file that data is being read from
        Returns:
        arraylist of string with all desired data from the state inputted
